translation.en: Lookie here.
My day is made. [laughs]
translation.fr: Ça va être une belle journée.

translation.en: I didn't even finish breakfast and I get to kill me a stinkin' Injun.
translation.fr:
Même pas fini le petit-déjeuner,
et je vais pouvoir descendre un Indien.

translation.en: Injun?
Nah.
I just dress like this so's I don't get scalped out on the prairie.
translation.fr:
Je m'habille comme ça
pour éviter d'être scalpé dans la prairie.

translation.en: Oh, well, that's a convincing outfit.
Yeah, you can't be too safe out there...
translation.fr: Oui, on n'est jamais trop prudent par ici,

translation.en: with all of them savages runnin' around.
translation.fr: avec tous ces sauvages qui se baladent.

translation.en: So, what can I do you for?
Need some flour. Five sacks.
And a carrot with peanut butter on it.
translation.fr:
Et une carotte
avec du beurre de cacahuète dessus.

translation.en: Now, what's that gonna run me?
Well, sack of flour's 45 cents.
translation.fr: Le sac de farine est à 45 cents.

translation.en: So, five sacks...
Wanna get back to me on that?
Yeah, look...
Now, the flour's in the basement.
translation.fr: La farine est à la cave.

translation.en: You can fetch it yourself.
Much obliged.
Well, lookie what we got here.
Sweet piece of red prairie meat out all by her lonesome.
translation.fr:
Une belle pièce de viande de la prairie
toute seule dehors.

translation.en: -What do you make of that, Nelly? -Oh, I think she's waiting on you, Will.
translation.fr:
- Que dis-tu de ça, Nelly ?
- Elle t'attend, Will.

translation.en: [Nelly Patch] Go on, get on it. [man 1] It's on now.
[man 2] Yeah. [Nelly Patch] Go get her, Will.
[Nelly Patch] Here we go.
Now, you must be wondering why five badass hombres with perfect jawlines...
translation.fr:
Tu dois te demander pourquoi
cinq voyous au profil parfait

translation.en: all sport the same stylish eye patch.
translation.fr: ont tous le même joli bandeau.

translation.en: Not my business.
[laughs] We all carved our eyeballs out our skull
to show how devoted we are to this gang.
translation.fr: en gage de loyauté à notre gang.

translation.en: We the Left-Eye Boys!
translation.fr: On est les Borgnes to be alive !

translation.en: You got real pretty eyes, miss.
translation.fr: T'as de jolis yeux, ma belle.

translation.en: You reckon we can, I don't know, borrow one?
translation.fr: Tu crois qu'on pourrait t'en piquer un ?

translation.en: -[screaming] -Can we borrow one?
Now, is that a proper question to ask a lady?
translation.fr: C'est une question à poser à une dame ?

translation.en: Who are you, slick? The boyfriend?
translation.fr: T'es qui, toi ? Le petit ami ?

translation.en: Soon to be the husband.
Oh, wait a minute! That's a white boy under that getup.
translation.fr: Attendez ! Y a un Blanc sous ce costume.

translation.en: That's a white boy? Oh, shit.
You partial to pale faces, Poca-hot-tits?
translation.fr:
Tu aimes bien les visages pâles,
Poca-chaudasse ?

translation.en: 'Cause I can show you what a real white man's like.
translation.fr:
Je peux te montrer
ce qu'est un vrai Blanc.

translation.en: -Yeah, show her, Will. Yeah, go on. -Yeah, shuffle up, Will.
-Dance now, boy. -Shuffle on over.
-There you go. -That's some white boy shit right there.
translation.fr:
- C'est ça.
- Ça, c'est du groove de Blanc.

translation.en: Now, I do want to carve my eyes out.
-What'd you say? -Hey, fellers...
I'd hit the trail before you get hurt.
translation.fr:
À votre place, je passerais ma route
avant de le regretter.

translation.en: [snickering] Before we get hurt?
-Before we get hurt. -[laughing]
I think you've been smokin' too much of that peace pipe, kemo-slobby.
translation.fr:
T'as un peu trop fumé
le calumet de la paix, ducon.

translation.en: -[Left-Eye Boys laughing] -Now, from what I see, there's one of you,
translation.fr: D'après ce que je vois, t'es tout seul,

translation.en: and there's five of us.
Four of you.
What just happened?
You wanna see it again?
-I don't like this shit. -Shut up.
translation.fr:
- Je n'aime pas ça.
- La ferme.

translation.en: Well, that's some, uh... real fancy footwork.
But I think this hullabaloo has escalated to the firearms stage.
translation.fr:
Ce charivari en arrive
au stade des armes à feu.

translation.en: Boys, let's ventilate this.
What the shit that just happened?
[weakly] What the hell? What in the hell?
"Hit the trail." It was so simple.
You must stop doing this, White Knife. One day, there will be too many.
translation.fr:
Tu dois arrêter ça, Lame Fatale.
Un jour, il y en aura trop.

translation.en: But not today, Smoking Fox.
translation.fr: Mais pas aujourd'hui, Splendeur Du Soir.

translation.en: Please, my love... we must go.
translation.fr: Je t'en prie, mon amour, partons.

translation.en: [shouting] What the hell happened out here?
Injuns. They went that way.
translation.fr: Des Indiens. Ils sont partis par là.

translation.en: You ain't no white man.
You're that orphan, White Knife.
Raised like an animal with those Apaches.
translation.fr: Élevé par les Apaches comme un animal.

translation.en: [scoffs] You think you can fool ol' Clem?
translation.fr: Tu crois pouvoir berner le vieux Clem ?

translation.en: Sorry, Ringo.
Well, now I'm gonna shoot you and your Injun whore.
translation.fr:
Je vais vous trouer la peau,
à toi et ta putain de squaw.

translation.en: Gotta cut breakfast short.
You suck, mister!
What are you?
[child] Yes, White Knife.
Go, White Knife.
You lucky, Smoking Fox.
translation.fr: Tu as de la chance, Splendeur Du Soir.

translation.en: White Knife all man. Bravest of all braves.
translation.fr:
Lame Fatale, vrai homme.
Le plus brave des braves.

translation.en: Not brave. Foolish.
I want to be wife, not widow.
translation.fr: Je veux être une femme, pas une veuve.

translation.en: Afternoon, ladies.
This is Apache land.
I'm not here to take your land, Chief.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas venu prendre votre terre.

translation.en: I'm just looking for a particular boy.
I'm Frank Stockburn.
This boy's mother was my wife.
translation.fr: La mère du garçon était ma femme.

translation.en: And the boy, Tommy...
he's my son.
It is wise to be slow to trust, White Knife.
translation.fr:
Il est sage de prendre son temps
pour donner sa confiance.

translation.en: But every new journey begins with a single step.
translation.fr:
Mais chaque aventure commence
par un premier pas.

translation.en: Speak with your father.
But you are my father, Screaming Eagle.
translation.fr: Mais tu es mon père, Aigle Hurlant.

translation.en: Ever since my mother...
Ever since you found me...
you taught me to hunt, to fight...
translation.fr: tu m'as enseigné la chasse, le combat,

translation.en: when to speak and when to be silent.
translation.fr: quand parler et quand se taire.

translation.en: -To be a man. -A good man.
translation.fr:
- Comment être un homme.
- Un homme bon.

translation.en: And this Frank Stockburn,
he is filled with lies, just like every other white man.
translation.fr:
il est pétri de mensonges,
comme tous les Blancs.

translation.en: Sometimes, the white man speaks the truth.
Like, one in 20, 25 times.
I believe this is one of those times.
translation.fr: Je crois que cette fois en fait partie.

translation.en: He knew your mother, White Knife.
translation.fr: Il connaissait ta mère, Lame Fatale.

translation.en: Maybe he can give you some peace. Talk to him.
translation.fr:
Peut-être pourra-t-il
t'apporter la paix. Parle-lui.

translation.en: Maybe after I close my eyes to dream.
translation.fr:
Peut-être après avoir fermé les yeux
pour rêver.

translation.en: Mommy!
One look at me, and you knew your old man had done a lot of bad things, didn't ya?
translation.fr:
Dès que tu m'as vu, tu as su
que j'avais fait des sales coups, hein ?

translation.en: I cheated men, I killed men...
translation.fr: J'ai trompé des hommes, tué des hommes...

translation.en: So I deserve whatever's comin' to me.
The only one that ever saw any good in me was your mother.
translation.fr:
Ta mère est la seule
à avoir vu du bon en moi.

translation.en: Why have you come here?
Not a man for chitchat, huh? [chuckles]
translation.fr: Tu n'aimes pas faire la conversation ?

translation.en: Well, me neither.
Kid, I'm dying...
of consumption.
Don't worry...
I'm not looking for no big father-son hoo-ah.
translation.fr:
je ne cherche pas
des retrouvailles père-fils.

translation.en: "I love you, son." [imitates child's voice] "I love you too, Daddy."
translation.fr:
"Mon fils, je t'aime."
"Je t'aime aussi, papa."

translation.en: I've come for a more tangible reason.
translation.fr: Il y a une bonne raison à ma visite.

translation.en: Tommy, I've been stealing from folks since I was nine years old...
translation.fr: Je vole les gens depuis que j'ai neuf ans,

translation.en: and that's the way I've amassed a good little fortune.
translation.fr: j'ai donc amassé une belle petite fortune.

translation.en: [sighs] I wanna do something decent with it.
translation.fr: Je veux en faire quelque chose de bien.

translation.en: I want to give it to you, son.
translation.fr: Je veux te la donner, fiston.

translation.en: I don't want your money.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas de ton argent.

translation.en: But maybe you could give...
$50,000 to these nice Injuns who raised you.
translation.fr: Mais tu pourrais donner 50 000 $ à ces gentils Indiens qui t'ont élevé.

translation.en: We'll take it.
Go back to bed.
Sorry.
Seriously, though, we'll take it.
translation.fr: Mais sérieusement, on en veut bien.

translation.en: Look, it's buried in the meadow just up the trail,
translation.fr:
L'argent est enterré dans la prairie
au bout de la piste,

translation.en: next to a big ol' pine tree.
What do you say we go dig it up in the morning
translation.fr: Que dis-tu d'y aller demain matin

translation.en: and start playing Santa Claus?
translation.fr: et de jouer les pères Noël ?

translation.en: I don't remember much about my mother...
translation.fr:
Je ne me souviens pas
de grand-chose de ma mère,

translation.en: but I do remember her telling me...
you were dead.
Maybe it was because...
she didn't want you to come looking for me.
translation.fr:
qu'elle ne voulait pas
que tu viennes me chercher.

translation.en: She was a smart lady.
Only stupid thing she ever did was fall for me.
translation.fr:
La seule chose idiote qu'elle ait faite,
c'est de m'aimer.

translation.en: Meeting Betty Dunson...
was the luckiest thing that ever happened to me.
translation.fr:
est la plus grande chance
que j'aie jamais eue.

translation.en: From the first day I laid eyes on her...
translation.fr: Dès le premier jour où je l'ai vue.

translation.en: she was bawlin' out this...
half-drunk, big ol' burly blacksmith...
translation.fr: un vieux forgeron à moitié ivrogne

translation.en: down at Silver Canyon.
She's been the only one, Tommy.
Mom had a temper?
[chuckling] Temper? When she got her dander up, look out.
translation.fr:
Quand on l'énervait,
il fallait faire gaffe.

translation.en: We was in a saloon once.
translation.fr: Une fois, on était dans un saloon.

translation.en: This fellow sitting next to her
translation.fr: Un type s'est assis près d'elle

translation.en: starts talking about the perfect way to make a cherry pie...
translation.fr:
et a commencé à lui dire
comment faire une tarte aux cerises...

translation.en: So your mom says to me, "Frank, come here a minute.
translation.fr:
Ta mère m'a dit :
"Frank, viens voir une minute.

translation.en: Tell me again, just where did you get them flowers?"
translation.fr: Redis-moi où tu as trouvé ces fleurs."

translation.en: I said, "I know that you think I stole them from the graveyard."
translation.fr:
J'ai dit : "Je sais que tu crois
que je les ai volées au cimetière."

translation.en: Good morning, boys.
Morning, Never Wears Bra.
I had dream about you last night, White Knife.
translation.fr: J'ai fait un rêve, Lame Fatale.

translation.en: Oh, that's nice.
Not nice dream.
In dream, you naughty.
translation.fr: Dans mon rêve, tu étais vilain.

translation.en: You naughty, White Knife.
Mmm, somebody's got an admirer.
But like you, there's only one woman for me.
translation.fr:
Mais comme toi,
je n'ai d'yeux que pour une femme.

translation.en: I guess we Stockburns are... partial to the sweet ones.
translation.fr:
Nous, les Stockburn,
on aime les gentilles.

translation.en: Like your mother.
How did she die, Tommy?
You tell me?
Well, there were these big kids at school fixin' to beat me up.
translation.fr:
Des garçons de l'école voulaient
me casser la figure.

translation.en: Instead of facing them myself, I had her walk me there.
translation.fr:
Au lieu de les affronter,
je lui ai demandé de m'emmener.

translation.en: This feller comes out of nowhere...
translation.fr: Un type est sorti de nulle part,

translation.en: walks right up to her and shoots her dead.
translation.fr:
est venu jusqu'à elle
et lui a mis une balle dans la tête.

translation.en: So that's how she died, protecting her gutless son
translation.fr:
Elle est morte comme ça,
en protégeant son lâche de fils

translation.en: instead of being home, safe where she belonged.
translation.fr:
au lieu d'être chez elle,
en sécurité, comme il se doit.

translation.en: Who's that? Is that Bony Express?
[Tommy] Bony Express don't come around here.
translation.fr: Non, il ne vient pas par ici.

translation.en: He's here somewhere, boys.
translation.fr: Il est par ici, les gars.

translation.en: Let's burn him out!
translation.fr: On va lui faire la peau !

translation.en: Next one goes through your forehead.
translation.fr: Le prochain finira entre tes yeux.

translation.en: Hey, hey! No need to burn nothing, boys!
translation.fr: Inutile de mettre le feu, les gars !

translation.en: Howdy, boss.
Cicero...
you're not gonna let a man enjoy his retirement, are ya?
translation.fr:
tu ne veux pas me laisser
profiter de ma retraite ?

translation.en: No, Frank, I salute your decision to turn from your sinful ways.
translation.fr:
Non, Frank. J'admire ta décision
d'arrêter tous tes péchés.

translation.en: But the money... that belongs to all of us.
translation.fr: Mais l'argent est à nous tous.

translation.en: Touch that steel, boy,
translation.fr: Si tu touches à ta hache,

translation.en: I got plenty of bullets left over after I put one in...
translation.fr:
j'aurai encore plein de balles
après en avoir logé une...

translation.en: your father.
Oh, you finally found your long lost son.
translation.fr: Tu as enfin retrouvé ton fils perdu.

translation.en: Well, I sure hate to break up this nice family reunion.
translation.fr:
Désolé d'interrompre
ces jolies retrouvailles en famille.

translation.en: So, why don't you give us the money you stole
translation.fr: Donne-nous donc l'argent que tu as volé

translation.en: before I put lead in your head.
translation.fr: avant que je te plombe la tête.

translation.en: The money's buried.
Way to run your mouth, son.
It's buried?
Yeah, I buried it.
Deep in the ground... next to a windmill.
A windmill in the West... doesn't narrow it down much, Frank.
translation.fr: Une éolienne dans l'Ouest, c'est vague.

translation.en: Well, this is a special windmill.
It's a singing windmill.
[Cicero] A singing windmill!
It's about a ten-day ride from here.
translation.fr: C'est à environ dix jours d'ici.

translation.en: I'll lead you to it presently on one condition.
translation.fr: Je vous y mènerai à une condition.

translation.en: You don't hurt my boy...
translation.fr: Ne faites pas de mal à mon fiston...

translation.en: or any of these kindly Injuns here.
Let's ride, Frank.
Frank, if that $50,000 isn't under that windmill,
translation.fr:
Si les 50 000 $ ne sont pas
près de l'éolienne,

translation.en: I'm gonna bury you up to your neck
and let the desert critters eat you alive.
translation.fr:
et tu te feras bouffer
par les bestioles du désert.

translation.en: It's there, Cicero, it's there.
I'm glad I got to meet Betty Dunson's son.
translation.fr:
Ravi d'avoir pu rencontrer
le fils de Betty Dunson.

translation.en: You just stay here, Tommy.
Enjoy your life with your beautiful bride...
translation.fr: Profite de la vie avec ta belle épouse

translation.en: amongst these majestic pine trees.
translation.fr: au beau milieu de ces pins majestueux.

translation.en: Let's go!
Well, that was uncool.
White Knife, you must rest.
How can I rest?
When they get to the singing windmill and find no money, they will kill him.
translation.fr:
Quand ils ne trouveront rien
à l'éolienne chantante, ils le tueront.

translation.en: My son, there are too many trees and too little time.
translation.fr:
Mon fils,
il y a trop d'arbres et peu de temps.

translation.en: Then I must get this $50,000 another way.
translation.fr:
Alors, il me faut un autre moyen
de trouver ces 50 000 $.

translation.en: How? By stealing? There is no honor in that.
translation.fr:
Comment ? Les voler ?
Ce n'est pas honorable.

translation.en: Unless I steal from those who have no honor.
translation.fr:
Sauf si je les vole
à ceux qui n'ont pas d'honneur.

translation.en: Ooh... I like that.
But it is too dangerous.
I will send ten of our strongest braves with you.
translation.fr:
Dix de nos braves les plus forts
t'accompagneront.

translation.en: The braves would be treated too cruelly in the white man's world.
translation.fr:
Ils seraient maltraités
dans le monde de l'homme blanc.

translation.en: A lot of them can pass for pale face.
translation.fr: Beaucoup passent pour des visages pâles.

translation.en: Raging Bear can actually do a great impression of a white guy.
translation.fr: Ours Mal Léché imite très bien le Blanc.

translation.en: Hey, guys, let's play with our chest hair and eat potato chips.
translation.fr:
Les gars, jouons avec les poils
de notre torse et mangeons des chips.

translation.en: Wasn't that great? Where does he come up with this stuff?
translation.fr: Pas mal, non ? Comment il trouve ça ?

translation.en: That's very good, Bear, but I must walk this path alone.
translation.fr:
C'est très bien, Ours,
mais je dois tracer ce chemin seul.

translation.en: My love... I will get this money... bring it to the singing windmill,
translation.fr:
Mon amour, je trouverai l'argent,
je l'apporterai à l'éolienne chantante

translation.en: and be back in time for our wedding.
translation.fr: et je serai de retour pour notre noce.

translation.en: I won't let you go.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas que tu partes.

translation.en: Those men are killers.
I was a coward once and my mother paid the price.
translation.fr:
J'ai été lâche dans le passé,
et ma mère en a payé le prix.

translation.en: That will not happen to my father.
translation.fr: Cela n'arrivera pas à mon père.

translation.en: -[horse neighs] -Good morning.
Where in the hell did you come from?
I'm in a bit of a bind, boys.
translation.fr: J'ai un petit problème, les gars.

translation.en: I rode all the way out here to pan for gold
translation.fr:
Je suis venu à cheval jusqu'ici
pour chercher de l'or,

translation.en: and my horse up and died on me.
translation.fr: et mon cheval m'a lâché, il est mort.

translation.en: How'd he die?
Suicide.
Drowned himself.
Put his head in the stream and just kept it there.
translation.fr:
Il a mis la tête dans le ruisseau
et est resté là.

translation.en: Saddest thing you ever seen.
translation.fr: Jamais rien vu de plus triste.

translation.en: It happens.
Powers that be don't like to admit it, but it happens.
translation.fr:
Le pouvoir en place ne veut pas
l'admettre, mais ça arrive.

translation.en: He looks like an honest white guy.
translation.fr: Il m'a l'air d'un honnête Blanc.

translation.en: Hop on.
Much obliged.
[Tommy] Just drop me off at the nearest town.
translation.fr: Laissez-moi à la ville la plus proche.

translation.en: [man] Ladies and gentlemen, gather around.
Hear the wondrous effects of Dr. Chubb's Vita Oil,
translation.fr:
Découvrez les merveilleux bienfaits
de l'Huile Vita du Dr Chubb,

translation.en: the miracle cure for 1001 ailments.
translation.fr: remède miracle de mille et une maladies.

translation.en: Put the pep back in your--
Who's this asshole?
Well, now, look at this fella, drinking from the horse trough.
translation.fr:
Regardez ce type,
il boit dans l'auge du cheval.

translation.en: Excuse me.
You there!
What you're doing is disgusting.
translation.fr: C'est dégoûtant, ce que vous faites.

translation.en: That water is for our filthy horses.
translation.fr: Cette eau est pour nos chevaux sales.

translation.en: Water flows from the sky spirit for all its children.
translation.fr:
L'esprit du ciel envoie l'eau
pour tous ses enfants.

translation.en: Isn't that right, cousin?
We don't cotton to that peyote-smoking nonsense around these parts.
translation.fr:
On n'aime pas les balivernes
des fumeurs de peyote par ici.

translation.en: Do you hear me, "cousin"?
[chuckling] Okay, William, come on back.
Hey, amigo.
You planning on staying in town?
Might need a place to lay my head for a bit.
translation.fr:
J'aurais peut-être besoin
d'un endroit où m'allonger.

translation.en: Sorry about that ugly man that insulted you.
translation.fr: Désolée pour les insultes du vieux moche.

translation.en: He runs the bank, so he thinks he's entitled to be mean to everyone.
translation.fr:
Il dirige la banque et se permet
d'être méchant avec tout le monde.

translation.en: There's a bank in this town?
translation.fr: Il y a une banque, ici ?

translation.en: Why? You wanna rob it?
I look like a bank robber to you, ma'am?
Funny, there's something about you that reminds me of a certain bank robber.
translation.fr:
C'est drôle,
tu me rappelles un certain braqueur.

translation.en: His name was Frank Stockburn.
You know Frank Stockburn?
"Know"? Like, in the biblical sense?
No, ma'am. You've met him before is what I'm asking.
translation.fr: Non. Je demande si vous l'avez rencontré.

translation.en: Yes, I met him.
Then, 20 minutes later,
I knew him in the biblical sense on that bed, right there.
translation.fr: je l'ai connu au sens biblique sur ce lit.

translation.en: And, I knew him, in the biblical sense, twice on this railing.
translation.fr:
Et je l'ai connu, au sens biblique,
deux fois sur cette rambarde.

translation.en: And then, while doing a handstand on that dresser you're leaning against.
translation.fr:
Et en faisant le poirier sur cette commode
contre laquelle tu te trouves.

translation.en: Did he happen to mention a singing windmill?
He did mention a singing windmill.
translation.fr: Il en a parlé, en effet.

translation.en: He said it sounded like a choir of angels.
translation.fr: Selon lui, on aurait dit un chœur d'anges.

translation.en: Where'd he say it was?
He said that it was in a place where he made his biggest score.
translation.fr:
Il a dit qu'elle se trouvait
là où il avait gagné son plus gros butin.

translation.en: Whatever that was.
And then he laughed.
He liked to laugh...
and have handstand sex.
translation.fr: et faire l'amour en faisant le poirier.

translation.en: Yeah, we gotta get past that.
I miss him.
But he did leave me something to remember him by.
translation.fr: Mais il m'a laissé un souvenir.

translation.en: What's this?
A niño, Ramon.
I have a brother?
Oh, Burro, we had many adventures together, you and me.
translation.fr:
Bourricot, on a partagé
bien des aventures.

translation.en: We're not getting any younger.
At least we have our memories.
translation.fr: On aura au moins nos souvenirs.

translation.en: Remember the two girls, the sisters, in Deadwood?
translation.fr:
Tu te rappelles les deux sœurs,
à Deadwood ?

translation.en: You liked the fat one.
You know it's true.
[Tommy] Ramon Lopez?
I just came from conversating with your mother, Esmerelda.
translation.fr:
Je viens d'avoir une conversation
avec ta mère, Esmerelda.

translation.en: We stumbled upon the fact that your dad and my dad...
translation.fr:
On a découvert par hasard
que ton père et mon père...

translation.en: are the same fella.
translation.fr: sont un seul et même homme.

translation.en: Oh, that's neat.
Same father.
Half-brothers.
What do you think about that, Burro?
So, how is Dad?
Well, he went and got himself kidnapped,
and I need to come up with $50,000 to save his life.
translation.fr:
et je dois trouver 50 000 $

translation.en: That's a lot of pesos.
Sure is.
That's why I'm fixin' to rob the bank here in town.
translation.fr:
C'est pour ça
que j'ai prévu de braquer la banque.

translation.en: Hang on.
My father is in trouble.

translation.en: My brother, he needs my help.

translation.en: I'll rob the bank with you.
translation.fr: Je vais braquer la banque avec toi.

translation.en: I must do this alone.
What's happening right now?
Ever since I'm pequeño,
I dream about spending one magical day with mi padre,
translation.fr:
je rêve de passer un jour magique
avec mi padre,

translation.en: sharing meals, introducing him to the burro.
translation.fr:
partager les repas,
le présenter au bourricot.

translation.en: I will not let go of you until you say I can help you.
translation.fr:
Je ne te lâcherai pas
tant que tu n'accepteras pas mon aide.

translation.en: Will you stop brushing me if I say yes?
translation.fr:
Tu arrêteras de me brosser,
si je dis oui ?

translation.en: Then you can help.
That means he likes you.
translation.fr: Ça veut dire qu'il t'aime bien.

translation.en: That's a good amount of money you want us to lend you.

C'est une belle somme d'argent
que vous demandez là.

translation.en: Now, normally, we would require two forms of identification, madam,
translation.fr:
Normalement, on a besoin
de deux pièces d'identité,

translation.en: but that won't be necessary in your case.
translation.fr:
mais ce ne sera pas nécessaire
dans votre cas.

translation.en: -[woman sighs] -I feel kinda guilty about this, Burro, taking money from nice people.

Je me sens un peu coupable, Bourricot,

translation.en: I mean, it's not like you're some greasy Mexican.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas comme si vous étiez
une Mexicaine sale.

translation.en: I feel less guilty now.
What are you doing?
This is a bank!
Get that donkey out of here!
It is a burro, señor.
I don't care, "señor." Get it out!
All right. Vámonos.
The burro don't want to vámonos.
translation.fr: Le bourricot ne veut pas vámonos.

translation.en: Well, I don't really care what the burro wants.
translation.fr: Je me fiche de ce que veut le bourricot.

translation.en: Get out of my bank, you beast!
translation.fr: Sors de ma banque, sale bête !

translation.en: I know what you're thinking, but not yet.
translation.fr: Je sais à quoi tu penses, mais pas encore.

translation.en: Hold it.
How is this jackass stuck?
If it got in here, it can certainly get out!
translation.fr: S'il est entré, il peut sûrement sortir !

translation.en: It doesn't make sense, it's not logical.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas logique. COFFRE FORT T.L. WOODROW

translation.en: They got it locked up good, do they?
Oh! You are leaving!
Gall dang, he felled on his pooper!
translation.fr: Nom de dela, il est tombé sur les fesses !

translation.en: -[bank manager] That makes no sense! -[Ramon stammering] I apologize.
translation.fr:
- Je ne comprends pas !
- Je suis désolé.

translation.en: -I don't know how many times I could-- -Hey, friend.
translation.fr:
- J'ignore combien de fois je pourrais...
- Salut.

translation.en: Need any help gettin' her out?

translation.en: [quietly] She's not really stuck, amigo. She's just a diversion.
translation.fr:
Elle n'est pas vraiment coincée, amigo.
On va faire sauter le coffre.

translation.en: She's a virgin?
I'm a virgin, too...
unless you count canty-loupes.
I believe that, but she's a diversion

Je te crois,
mais c'est pour faire diversion

translation.en: [stammers] You're robbin' the bank?
-Gall dang! -Shh, shh.
[whispers] Gall dang. Gall dang. Gall dang.
No! Virgil! Virgil, the key!
I'm Lil Pete.
So, is your father, like, Big Pete?

translation.en: I didn't know my pa.

translation.en: But he was a bank robber like y'all! His name was Frank.

Mais c'était un braqueur de banque,
comme vous ! Il s'appelait Frank.

translation.en: -Stockburn? -How'd you know?
Are you a wizard?
[Frank] Hey, Johnny Law.
We'll be waiting for you up at Jawbone Falls.
Frank Stockburn.
What?
Robbery!
We're being burgled!
You! Horse-water-drinker!
translation.fr: Toi ! Le buveur de l'eau des chevaux !

translation.en: You are caught, sir!
What are you?
Hey, Tommy, guess what? We got ourselves a little brother.

Oui ! Nos mères se sont toutes fait niquer

translation.en: -Ain't that a pip? -Yeah, that's something.

- Rigolo, non ?
- Oui, c'est quelque chose.

translation.en: Now!
-Nice one, Burro. -Wow!
-There they are! -[Ramon] We better make tracks.
Can I come with? I got a wagon.

translation.en: All right, that ain't a bad idea, let's go.

[Lil Pete] So, if you guys are my brothers, you must got three nipples, too.
translation.fr:
Si vous êtes mes frères,
vous devez avoir trois tétons, vous aussi.

translation.en: [Ramon] I only got two.
[Tommy] Yeah, just got the two.
[Lil Pete] Oh, must be from my mama's side.
translation.fr: Ça doit venir de ma mère.

translation.en: Forget I tolded you that, okay?

translation.en: [Tommy] Will do.
[Will Patch] Are you ready, Clem?
[Clem] Yep, yep. I'm... I'm ready.
Spoon.
Damn sharp.

Écoutez, je veux chasser
l'Indien blanc comme vous.

I have some problems with my eyes.
You wanna join the Left-Eye Gang, that right eye has gotta come out.

Si tu veux être des Borgnes to be alive,
faut enlever l'œil droit.

Yeah, like a hundred seconds.
-Then you're one of us. -For life.

translation.en: Okay, that makes sense.
Is it okay if I scoop this left eye out?

This right one sees like an eagle.

Celui-ci est perçant
comme l'œil d'un aigle.

translation.en: Yeah, it just seems like a waste that I'd...
I understand your predicament, but rules is rules.

Je comprends ton problème,
mais les règles sont les règles.

translation.en: Yeah, guess it... makes sense.
Oh, God!
That ain't right!
-[grunts] -[Gus Patch] Damn!
[Will Patch] It's half way.
-It's dangling by a vein! -[Clem] Whoo! Oh, man!
translation.fr:
- Il pendouille par une veine !
- Mince !

translation.en: It's crazy, I can still see out of it!
-Goddamn, it hurts! -I think I'm gonna puke.
translation.fr:
- Ça fait mal !
- Je vais vomir.

translation.en: It's just going round and round like a tassel on a stripper's titty!

Ça se balance comme le pompon

translation.en: Okay, gotta get it, gotta get it!
I'm getting dizzy!
Got it, got it, got it!
Oh, Lord! Holy shit.
You done it, partner. Welcome to the Left-Eye Gang.

T'as réussi.
Bienvenue chez les Borgnes to be alive.

translation.en: I did it!
[laughing] I'm glad that's done.

translation.en: Let's just go get that Injun-loving son of a bitch, huh?

Allons nous faire

translation.en: -Yeah! Let's get him. -Yeah.
Like, so...
Oh, I touched the hole. I touched the hole!
Got me a patch! [chuckles]
[Lil Pete] Dear Mama, you may be wondering
translation.fr: Chère maman, tu dois te demander

pourquoi je ne suis pas encore rentré
de chez le glacier.

C'est parce que j'ai rencontré mes frères,
Ramon et Tommy.

qui ont emmené papa

Tommy dit que ce n'est pas bien

Heureusement, il y a

-[Ramon] Eat it! You know you like it. -[Lil Pete laughing] [Ramon] You know you like it.

[Ramon] That's right.
Enjoy it!
-That's just wrong. -Yeah, yeah.

on accumule les 50 000 $

Oui, c'est vrai.
Je suis en train de t'écrire.

Je veux qu'il me dise

translation.en: And how the lady poops 'em out.

Yeah, Lil Pete?

C'est là que papa a gagné

On aura peut-être un indice de plus

C'est là qu'il se cachait

translation.en: [laughs] Oh, cool beans.
Tommy?
Yeah, Lil Pete?
If we get caught stealing...

I reckon we'll hang.
Well... that's no bother.

Maman me fait tirer la charrue

translation.en: [chuckling] Which occurs regularilly.
Strong neck might come in handy.

Good night, Tommy.
Good night, Lil Pete.
[Lil Pete] Good night, Ramon.
[Ramon] Good night, brothers.
Good night, Burro.

We will have good dry weather tomorrow.

Allez, la mouche, vámonos !
On veut dormir.

I think you just nicked his biscuits off.

He didn't deserve to die.

Mais de savoir
qu'elle n'était pas la bienvenue ici.

[Ramon] Well, let me get this one.
[Ramon] Sounded like a horse fly.
That wasn't a horse fly, that was my horse!

Oh, Peanut!
[Ramon] Oh, the burro's gonna be pissed.

Ne sois pas intimidé par le cheval,

Des noix, des baies, de l'écorce,
différentes boues.

Si seulement il y avait

De la viande, du fromage et des tomates
dans une pâte croustillante.

translation.en: You'd love it, man.
Ooh, I want one. I want 50.
Hate to put an end to this fascinating conversation,
but we're here.
-[horse neighs] -Jawbone Falls.
[chuckles] And there's a mansion next to it!
Should we just go in?
I reckon.
[Tommy] Hello?
[chuckles] Well, this is cozy.
[Tommy] Hello?
Hold on!
[Lil Pete] Tommy!
[Lil Pete] Stop! Leave my brother alone!
Simon says, "Stop!"
Don't hurt my brother!

translation.en: -Stop! -Huh?
Good thinking, Tommy.
[Tommy] All right.
Not for me, but good one, Tommy.

translation.en: [Tommy] Settle, settle, watch it...
It's all right, it's all right...
We don't mean no harm.

translation.en: -We're just looking for our dad. -[Ramon] Sí.
translation.fr:
- On cherche juste notre père.
- Sí.

translation.en: Is this your place?
Whose place is it?
Your mother?
-[chuckles] -Oh, is she here right now?
Oh, she's dead.
I'm so sorry, I'm sure she was a good woman.

Je suis désolé,
c'était sûrement une femme bien.

Oh, your mama has three nipples?
-Yeah, there's three of us. -[exclaims]
-[Ramon] Three of us, sí. -Okay. Okay.

Ta mère et toi distilliez

Making moonshine for Frank Stockburn?
You know Frank Stockburn?
He slept here?
With your mama?
[chuckles] Your mama was an owl.
No, our dad made his mom make owl noises.

Non, notre père faisait faire à sa mère
des bruits de chouette.

translation.en: Yeah, that's right, friend. We're your brothers.

translation.en: [laughing] Gall dang!
-Down the hatch, boys! -Salud. Salud.
What's your name, anyways?
Squiggly line, asterisk.
How 'bout we just call you Herm?
[Ramon] Herm, so you know,
translation.fr: Herm, il faut que tu saches

que notre père a été enlevé
par des méchants muchachos.

translation.en: -we need money to get him back. -[grunts]
translation.fr: On a besoin d'argent pour le récupérer.

translation.en: So we're going to steal the money.
No, we're only stealing the money from folks what are bad.

Tu connais un endroit où on peut voler
plein d'argent aux méchants ?

translation.en: [Tommy] He's got something.
The Gold Nugget Saloon, huh?
I reckon you're coming with us?

translation.en: [woman] Smoking Fox so worried about White Knife.

Splendeur Du Soir inquiète

translation.fr:
Vous pas le droit d'être là !
Terre apache !

translation.fr:
Et qu'est-ce que tu vas faire,
haleine de putois ?

translation.en: How he know my name?
-[exclaims] -That's really her name!
Yeah, I think you also could have gone with "Face Like Witch."

Tu aurais aussi pu dire

C'est tout ? Personne d'autre ?

translation.en: Well, well, well.

translation.fr:
BARBIER - MÉDECIN - DENTISTE Puis la mine d'or s'est tarie,

Le saloon est le seul endroit

translation.en: Open day and night since they built it. Ain't even a lock on the front door.

Jour et nuit depuis sa construction.
Même pas de verrou sur la porte.

They got a big ol' golden nugget hanging above the fireplace.

Une grosse pépite est accrochée

translation.en: Folks come from all over just to take a look.

translation.en: They say it's worth about $20,000, easy.

On dit qu'elle vaut
près de 20 000 $, facile.

translation.en: All right.
I'm surprised no one's ever tried to stolen that nugget.
translation.fr:
Surprenant que personne n'ait tenté

If you go in there, you see their thumbs hanging above the bar.

Si vous y allez, vous verrez

translation.en: Smiley Harris, the owner, bit them clean off.
translation.fr: Mordus par Smiley Harris, le propriétaire.

translation.fr: Personne ne cherche de noises à Smiley.

translation.en: That sort of tickled.
What we got going over here, friend?
Just open your robe, please.
I have never seen that big of a rash...
or infection
or whatever this green bubble is.

Now, son, I would simply recommend that you stop doing
translation.fr:
Fiston, je vous recommande
d'arrêter tout net

ou quoi que ce soit
d'impliqué dans ce que vous faites.

translation.fr:
parce que même quand il commet
les pires atrocités,

Now, he's why that nugget has never been stolen.

C'est pourquoi

translation.en: And never will be stolen.
This'll prevent infection.
[laughs] It tastes good, too.
This Smiley fella, sounds more like a hooligan than a barkeep.

Ce Smiley, on dirait plus
un voyou qu'un tenancier.

translation.en: You're not far off.
Rumor has it that back in the old days

translation.en: Lip balm?

Au petit-déjeuner

Au déjeuner

Pour dîner

Elle me laisse mettre ma crème

Jusqu'à la dernière goutte

Bienvenue au Gold Nugget Saloon,
messieurs.

translation.en: Mr. Harris, it's quite a nice spread you got here.
translation.fr: M. Harris, c'est un bel endroit chez vous.

translation.en: So what brings you gentlemen to town?
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qui vous amène donc par ici ?

translation.en: Actually, we wanted to ask you about something, Mr. Harris.
translation.fr: On voulait vous poser une question.

translation.en: Excuse me.
I am conversing with these gentlemen, sir. I shall be with you in a moment.
translation.fr:
Je discute avec ces messieurs.
Je suis à vous dans un instant.

translation.en: I need to talk to you about Frank Stockburn.
translation.fr: Je viens vous parler de Frank Stockburn.

translation.en: I haven't heard that name in many a year.

translation.fr: M. Stockburn et moi étions associés.

translation.en: I got a photograph.
You see, that there's him... and that's you.
translation.fr: Vous voyez, le voici... et là, c'est vous.

translation.en: You rode in his gang.

translation.fr: Pour être précis, c'était notre gang.

translation.en: He went on to a criminal career of some renown,
translation.fr: Il a fait carrière comme criminel réputé,

translation.fr: et j'ai réussi dans le commerce licite.

translation.en: Please help me.
Sir, you are becoming a nuisance.
I just need to tell him what I've done.

J'ai juste besoin

translation.en: I think he's had enough, boss.
My apologies, gentlemen.

translation.en: A round on the house.

translation.fr:
Et, Chico,
si tu me saisis le bras à nouveau,

translation.en: -[groans] -That's quite a beating.

Pourquoi voulez-vous tant

translation.en: Gall dang!

Well, I didn't wanna hide that from you

mais j'ignorais totalement
