translation.en: The meanest, crookedest, most hellacious town in the West.
translation.fr:
La ville la plus méchante,
tordue et infernale de l'Ouest.

translation.en: We don't need no preacher telling us what we can and cannot do.
translation.fr:
Pas besoin d'un prêtre pour nous dire
ce qu'on peut et ne peut pas faire.

translation.en: So it's all right if I do this to your wife?
translation.fr: Je peux donc faire ça à votre femme ?

translation.en: I can't wait to see all you nice people when I'm dangling!
translation.fr:
J'ai hâte de vous voir
quand je serai pendu !

translation.en: You sick bastard.
Get this over with.
You're in for a real treat today. This is gonna be so much fun.
translation.fr:
Vous allez voir ce que vous allez voir.
On va bien s'amuser.

translation.en: I'm just messing with y'all. I'm fine!
translation.fr: Je déconne avec vous. Tout va bien.

translation.en: I call this one Fish Out of Water.
translation.fr: Ça, c'est le poisson hors de l'eau.

translation.en: ♪ He flies through the air with the greatest of ease ♪
translation.fr:
Il vole dans les airs
Avec la plus grande facilité

translation.en: ♪ That daring young man on the flying trapeze ♪
translation.fr:
Ce jeune homme audacieux
Sur le trapèze volant

translation.en: Herm, put the hookers back.
Come on!
Yeah, you can't catch me! [laughing]
He ain't dying, Billy! He's making a fool of you!
translation.fr:
Il ne meurt pas, Billy !
Il se moque de toi !

translation.en: All right, that's it!
We'll shoot the son of a bitch!
translation.fr: On va le tirer comme un lapin, l'enfoiré !

translation.en: -[Lil Pete continues laughing] -On my command!
-Ready... -[guns cocking]
Aim...
Fire!
Wind took him, Tommy. Came damn close.
translation.fr:
Le vent l'a emporté, Tommy.
Il était moins une.

translation.en: I'm okay!
Come on, Billy! Get him!
We did it!
♪ Yippie-yo-yo-yea ♪
♪ Won't be so sad ♪
♪ Yippie-yo-yo-yea ♪
♪ We're gonna save Dad ♪
We still gotta get to Sweet Hog Rock before they do.
translation.fr:
Il faut arriver avant eux
au rocher de la Verge de Cochon.

translation.en: Gotta find that singing windmill, so it ain't over yet.
translation.fr:
Il faut trouver l'éolienne chantante,
c'est pas fini.

translation.en: We got the money!
-The Ridiculous 6 got all the money! -[Chico] Yeah!
translation.fr:
Les 6 Ridiculos
ont les cinquante mille dollars!

translation.en: Tommy! Tommy! What's Dad like? Is he funny?
translation.fr:
Tommy ! Il est comment, papa ?
Il est drôle ?

translation.en: Yeah, is he a good listener?
Is he strong?
All great questions. I'll tell you this.
translation.fr:
Excellentes questions.
Je vais vous dire une chose.

translation.en: I think you guys are gonna love him.
translation.fr: Je crois que vous allez l'adorer.

translation.en: But I'm sure he's gonna love you guys.
translation.fr: Mais je suis sûr qu'il va vous aimer.

translation.en: So sorry to interrupt such a tender moment.
translation.fr:
Désolé d'interrompre
ce petit moment de tendresse.

translation.en: [Nelly Patch] Looks like we stumbled on bath day, boys!
translation.fr:
On dirait que c'est
le jour du bain, les gars !

translation.en: I heard you picked up some brothers along the way, tough guy.
translation.fr:
Il paraît
que t'as récupéré des frères sur ta route.

translation.en: But I don't see no resemblance.
translation.fr: Mais je ne vois aucune ressemblance.

translation.en: -I do, they all look like my butthole. -[laughing]
translation.fr:
Si, ils ressemblent tous
à mon trou du cul.

translation.en: So guess what time it is, boys?
Payback time!
Any last words, No Knife? [laughs]
translation.fr: Un dernier mot, Lame de que dalle ?

translation.en: I told ya I could hold my breath good. Yeah, Danny boy!
translation.fr:
- Je retiens ma respiration longtemps.
- Bravo, Danny !

translation.en: What are you doing, man? We gotta go! [gasps]
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que tu fais ? On file !

translation.en: -Oh, jackpot, boys! -No!
-That's ours! -[Will Patch] Hyah!
Rusty!
Rusty, no, come back!
How are we gonna save him? We're startin' all over.
translation.fr:
Comment on va le sauver ?
Il faut tout recommencer.

translation.en: Is there any more good places we can rob?
translation.fr: Il reste des endroits à voler ?

translation.en: You know like a burro-grooming place or a shoe store for burros?
translation.fr:
Un salon de toilettage pour bourricots
ou un chausseur pour bourricots ?

translation.en: Half the lawmen in the West are already looking for us.
translation.fr:
La moitié des shérifs de l'Ouest est
à nos trousses.

translation.en: So what? Look, we can't stop.
translation.fr: Et alors ? On ne peut pas s'arrêter.

translation.en: They're going to kill him!
Ain't no difference. He's dying anyways.
translation.fr:
Ça ne change rien.
Il est en train de mourir.

translation.en: Dad's sick.
I'm sorry I didn't tell y'all.
translation.fr: Désolé de ne pas vous l'avoir dit.

translation.en: There's a good chance he's dead already.
translation.fr: Il y a des chances qu'il soit déjà mort.

translation.en: But there's a chance he's not. You got to meet him, Tommy.
translation.fr:
Peut-être que non.
Tu as pu le rencontrer, Tommy.

translation.en: The rest of us...
Even if it was just for five minutes, it'd be worth it.
translation.fr:
Même si c'est pour cinq minutes,
ça vaut la peine.

translation.en: If I don't talk to Dad, I'll die with this dirty secret burnin' a hole in my guts.
translation.fr:
Si je ne parle pas à papa, je vais mourir
bouffé par ce sale secret.

translation.en: Danito, whatever it is you did, you have to forgive yourself, man.
translation.fr:
Danito, quoi que tu aies fait,
il faut te pardonner.

translation.en: You wouldn't say that if you know what I done.
translation.fr:
Tu ne dirais pas ça
si tu savais ce que j'ai fait.

translation.en: -Everybody's got secrets, Danny. -[Ramon] Yeah.
translation.fr:
- Tout le monde a ses secrets, Danny.
- Oui.

translation.en: You guys are the first people I told I was black.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes les seuls
à qui j'ai dit que j'étais noir.

translation.en: You know how good that made me feel?
translation.fr:
Vous savez à quel point
ça m'a fait du bien ?

translation.en: We're your brothers.
You can tell us anything.
I, uh...
I used to work for the President of the United States.
translation.fr:
J'ai travaillé
pour le Président des États-Unis.

translation.en: I was his personal bodyguard. One of the best.
translation.fr:
J'ai été son garde du corps.
Un des meilleurs.

translation.en: Till one night...
Mr. President, say, I'm gonna go hit the little boys' room.
translation.fr:
M. le Président,
je dois aller aux toilettes.

translation.en: Are you shitting me?
Come on! You'll be fine, superstar.
translation.fr: Allez ! Ne vous en faites pas.

translation.en: Can I get ya something on the way back? Agua? Brewski?
translation.fr:
Je vous ramène quelque chose ?
De l'eau ? Une bière ?

translation.en: Mrs. Lincoln, how about one of them big pretzels or a little pillow?
translation.fr:
Mme Lincoln, un gros bretzel
ou un petit coussin ?

translation.en: I hear this play's kind of a long one.
translation.fr: Il paraît que la pièce est longue.

translation.en: All right, fair enough. I'll be back in two.
translation.fr: Bien. Je reviens tout de suite.

translation.en: Where's the president's box?
translation.fr: Où est la loge du président ?

translation.en: -John Wilkes Booth, the actor? -Yeah.
No way, man! Big fan!
-You wanna say hi to the president? -Yeah.
translation.fr:
- Vous voulez saluer le président ?
- Oui.

translation.en: He'd get a real kick out of that. Last door on the left.
translation.fr: Il sera ravi. Dernière porte à gauche.

translation.en: -Thank you. [chuckles nervously] -Really cool.
Wow! Love that guy!
-[gunshot] -[woman screams]
translation.fr:
PROGRAMME - THÉÂTRE FORD
LORD DUNDREARY, NOTRE COUSIN D'AMÉRIQUE

translation.en: [screaming] Abe!
[sighs] How can you go on living your life knowing you harmed so many people?
translation.fr:
Comment vivre quand on sait
qu'on a fait du mal à tant de gens ?

translation.en: That's what I wanna ask Dad.
translation.fr: C'est ce que je veux demander à papa.

translation.en: Hey, you ain't the one who pulled that trigger.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas toi qui as tiré.

translation.en: But if Dad's gotta be the one who tells you that...
translation.fr: Mais si c'est papa qui doit te le dire,

translation.en: then let's go get that money.
I just wish I knew how.
Herm's got an idea.
He just can't express it.
translation.fr: Il a du mal à l'exprimer.

translation.en: I just wish somebody here could speak Herm.
translation.fr: Si seulement l'un de nous parlait le Herm.

translation.en: [man] Tomorrow is Valentine's Day.
That's when Ezekiel Grant has his annual high-stakes poker game.
translation.fr:
C'est le jour de la grande partie de poker
d'Ezekiel Grant.

translation.en: There'll be oodles of money there. Oodles, I say.
translation.fr:
Il y aura plein d'argent.
Plein, je vous dis.

translation.en: -I don't know. That sounds risky. -What's risky?
translation.fr:
- Je ne sais pas. C'est risqué.
- Quoi donc ?

translation.en: He's suggesting we... knock off Ezekiel Grant's poker game.
translation.fr:
Il veut qu'on braque
la partie de poker d'Ezekiel Grant.

translation.en: -It's in Yuma tomorrow night. -[speaks gibberish]
Yuma's less than a day's walk from here.
translation.fr: Yuma est à moins d'une journée de marche.

translation.en: That poker game, there's practically gonna be an army protectin' it.
translation.fr:
Cette partie de poker sera protégée
par une véritable armée.

translation.en: If Tommy says we can beat 'em, I'll believe him.
translation.fr:
Si Tommy dit
qu'on peut les battre, je le crois.

translation.en: -We all will. -[grunts]
We can beat 'em...
for Dad.
[all] For Dad!
I hope you like the gift I'm giving you for Valentine's Day, Ezekiel.
translation.fr:
J'espère que tu aimes mon cadeau
pour la Saint-Valentin, Ezekiel.

translation.en: I'll give you a hint. One-hour massage, no charge.
translation.fr:
Petit indice.
Une heure de massage gratuit.

translation.en: Oh, Susannah.
You know what gift I'd really love?
translation.fr: Tu sais quel cadeau me ferait plaisir ?

translation.en: If you would just shut up!
Nothing ruins a good poker game more...
translation.fr: Rien ne gâche une partie de poker

translation.en: than a lady jabbering on and on...
translation.fr:
comme une dame
qui jacasse à longueur de temps.

translation.en: -How romantic. -[knocking on door]
Well, General Custer!
Yes, at your service.
Mr. Mark Twain.
-Word up! -Gentlemen, do come in.
Yo, Zeke, big boy, I was just going off to the General here about my new book.
translation.fr:
Zeke, je racontais au général
mon nouveau livre.

translation.en: -It's a sequel to Tom Sawyer. -Ooh.
It's about Sawyer's home slice, Huckleberry Finn.
translation.fr:
C'est sur le pote de Sawyer,
Huckleberry Finn.

translation.en: White boy goes raftin' with a brother. People gonna lose their shit!
translation.fr:
Un petit Blanc qui navigue avec un Noir.
Les gens vont flipper !

translation.en: And, General Custer, I see you've let your dashing blond hair grow out.
translation.fr:
Général Custer,
vous avez fait pousser vos blonds cheveux.

translation.en: Well, yes, the barber down at the regiment is just awful,
translation.fr: Oui, le barbier du régiment est affreux,

translation.en: so I had two choices, either let it grow or get scalped.
translation.fr:
soit je laissais pousser,
soit c'était le scalp.

translation.en: -And I ain't gonna let that happen. -[Mark and Ezekiel laughing]
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas laisser faire ça.

translation.en: Now, will our old friend from Tombstone be joining us?
translation.fr:
Notre vieil ami Tombstone se joint
à nous ?

translation.en: [Ezekiel] Late as usual.
But we have a new player, a wealthy Mexican coffee bean rancher.
translation.fr:
Mais nous avons un nouveau joueur,
un riche Mexicain producteur de café.

translation.en: Am I tardy-o?
Oh. [laughing] Sneaky little Mexican.
May I present Don Don Diego.
translation.fr: Je vous présente Don Don Diego.

translation.en: We run a gentleman's game here, Mr. Diego.
Your, uh, two bodyguards are completely unnecessary.
translation.fr: Vos deux gardes du corps sont inutiles.

translation.en: Bodyguards? [laughing]
[lisping] You're mistaken, General.
This is, um...
Chimichanga... my loyal manservant.
God bless you.
[Ramon] And, um...
Blanco Beardio.
He'll be providing the entertainment for this afternoon's festivities.
translation.fr: Il va nous divertir pendant l'après-midi.

translation.en: Well, drop me a beat.
Okay.
All right.
Here we go now.
Gentlemen, the buy-in is $15,000.
Fifteen large? Are you sure General Custard can swing that?
translation.fr:
Vous êtes sûr
que le général Costard les a ?

translation.en: It's Custer, not "Custard." There is no "D." I'm not a dessert.
translation.fr:
Custer, pas Costard.
Je suis en uniforme, moi.

translation.en: Boom, I just dropped some satire on your ass, General!
translation.fr:
Boum, je vous ai fait
une belle vanne, général !

translation.en: You got me!
Hey! Now, when Ramon gives the signal that the time is right,
translation.fr:
Quand Ramon donne le signal
que c'est le moment,

translation.en: that's when we move in.
You remember the signal, right?
-[man] Gentlemen. -You know where to go, Marshal.
translation.fr:
- Messieurs.
- Vous connaissez le chemin, marshal.

translation.en: That's Wyatt Earp!
The fastest gun in the West?
translation.fr: Le tireur le plus rapide de l'Ouest ?

translation.en: All right, all right, all right!
-Oh, Wyatt Earp, as I live and breathe! -[whispers] Wyatt Earp.
translation.fr:
- Wyatt Earp, en chair et en os !
- Wyatt Earp.

translation.en: [Ezekiel] You're here! [General Custer] Wyatt Earp.
translation.fr:
- Vous êtes là !
- Voilà Wyatt Earp.

translation.en: [Wyatt] Sorry I'm late, everybody.
But apparently, there's some new gang out there robbing everybody blind.
translation.fr:
Apparemment, un nouveau gang vole
tout le monde dans la région.

translation.en: Oh, they call themselves the Ridiculous 6.
translation.fr: Oh, ils se font appeler "Les 6 Ridiculos".

translation.en: I swear, a man can't ride five miles in this territory
translation.fr:
On ne peut pas faire
huit kilomètres dans le coin

translation.en: without running into outlaws, rattlesnakes, Injuns and--
translation.fr:
sans tomber sur des hors-la-loi,
des serpents, des Indiens et...

translation.en: Hey! Why don't you let me worry about the Injuns?
translation.fr:
Laissez-moi les Indiens,
j'en fais mon affaire.

translation.en: -[all laughing] -[Wyatt] Will do, General.
What's shakin', Twain?
Hey, I'm good on anything. Just like gravy, baby.
translation.fr: Je vais bien. J'ai la pêche.

translation.en: -Good to see you, my man. -You too, man.
translation.fr:
- Content de vous voir.
- Moi aussi.

translation.en: Hey! I finally read Prince and the Pauper.
translation.fr: J'ai enfin fini Le Prince et le Pauvre.

translation.en: Oh, is that right?
Didn't get it.
For reals?
-Satire! Boom! I got ya! -[all laughing]
translation.fr: Vanne ! Boum ! Je vous ai eu !

translation.en: -I'm just pulling your leg. -Oh, man.
I can't read.
Good one with the... satire.
[laughs] Funny.
Who's this idiot?
Um... I am Don...
Don Don Diego.
Well, Don, I'm Wyatt...
translation.fr: Eh bien, Don, je suis Wyatt...

translation.en: Wyatt Wyatt Earp.
Got him.
[in sing-song voice] Now let's play some cards!
translation.fr: Il est temps de jouer aux cartes !

translation.en: ♪ Say, say Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Say Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Tom Sawyer ♪
♪ Say the blacks and the whites are getting along ♪
translation.fr: Les Blancs et les Noirs s'entendent bien

translation.en: ♪ The blacks and the whites are getting along ♪
translation.fr: Les Blancs et les Noirs s'entendent bien

translation.en: ♪ I can't read ♪
♪ I can't read ♪
-[screaming] -[Ezekiel] Please calm yourself!
Let's get inside before this Wyatt Earp ruins our plan.
translation.fr:
Entrons avant que ce Wyatt Earp
ne fiche tout en l'air.

translation.en: But there's no way for you to sneak past them guys, Tommy.
translation.fr:
Tu ne peux pas y aller
sans être vu, Tommy.

translation.en: There's no rocks, no trees, no nothing to hide behind.
translation.fr:
Pas de roches, pas d'arbres,
rien pour te cacher.

translation.en: No need to hide, brother, when you are friends with the wind.
translation.fr:
Inutile de se cacher
quand on est ami avec le vent.

translation.en: I'm telling you, down there, they don't call it "Mexico."
translation.fr:
Je te le dis, là-bas,
on ne dit pas "Mexico".

translation.en: It's "Mehico." The "X" is an "H." I'm presuming Texas is "Tehas."
translation.fr:
Mais "Mehico". Le "x" est un "h".
Pour Texas, j'imagine que c'est "Tehas".

translation.en: Now, what's this?
Just a tumbleweed, you jumpy bastard.
translation.fr: Ce n'est que de l'herbe séchée, le flippé.

translation.en: That is some mystical shit.
I wish to move the dresser in my bedroom closer to the window,
translation.fr:
J'aimerais mettre la commode
près de ma fenêtre,

translation.en: but I haven't the strength to do it myself.
translation.fr:
mais je n'ai pas la force
de le faire seule.

translation.en: I'd love to help, ma'am, but I really should keep playing the piano.
translation.fr: J'aimerais vous aider, mais je dois jouer.

translation.en: -[piano music continues playing] -No one will even know you're gone.
translation.fr: Personne ne verra que vous n'êtes plus là.

translation.en: -Gentlemen, cough up your buy-ins. -All right!
translation.fr:
- Messieurs, crachez votre mise.
- C'est parti !

translation.en: Make it rain like Twain.
[General Custer] Take that and that. [Mark] Yeah!
Sure is some good hooch there, Zeke. Where'd you find that?
translation.fr:
La gnôle est bonne ici, Zeke.
Où avez-vous trouvé ça ?

translation.en: Oh, I got that from a case about, uh, 20 years ago.
translation.fr: Je l'ai eue il y a près de 20 ans.

translation.en: In fact, uh, you know that shack up by Jawbone Falls?
translation.fr:
En fait, vous connaissez l'abri
à Jawbone Falls ?

translation.en: -Yeah. -There was a lady living there.
It was one of Frank Stockburn's many paramours.
translation.fr: Une des belles de Frank Stockburn.

translation.en: Now this was one of the ugliest ladies I've ever seen in my life.
translation.fr:
Une des dames les plus moches
que j'aie jamais vues.

translation.en: Sounds like a real bucket of turds.
But she was a very talented distiller of alcohol.
translation.fr: Mais elle savait distiller de l'alcool.

translation.en: [chucking] So, while she--
While she's loading up my coach, her young boy comes out,
translation.fr:
Pendant qu'elle chargeait mon fiacre,
son fils est sorti,

translation.en: this big shambling oaf, mute, filthy as a hog,
translation.fr:
un nigaud qui traînait des pieds,
muet et sale comme un porc,

translation.en: and he starts doing this horrible little tap dance
translation.fr:
et s'est mis à faire
d'horribles claquettes

translation.en: whilst singing "The Star-Spangled Banner."
Well, not singing it, really, but grunting it, like a caveman!
translation.fr:
Non, pas en chantant, plutôt en grognant
comme un homme des cavernes !

translation.en: [grunting] ♪ Oh, say can you see ♪
You know, he wants me to throw him some pennies,
translation.fr: Il voulait que je lui lance des pièces,

translation.en: so I fished a coin out of my pocket
translation.fr: donc j'ai dégotté une pièce dans ma poche,

translation.en: and I guess I don't know my own strength.
translation.fr: et je ne connais pas ma force.

translation.en: I tossed it, hit him in the mouth, and knocked his tooth out!
translation.fr:
Je l'ai envoyée,
et elle lui a dégommé la dent !

translation.en: What an asshole!
[mumbles] Mama.
In any event, I still have one bottle left from that case.
translation.fr:
En tout cas, il me reste encore
une bouteille de cette caisse.

translation.en: I'll go fetch it and we can drink a toast to that awful woman and her hideous son.
translation.fr:
Je vais la chercher, on boira un verre
à ce laideron de femme et son fils.

translation.en: Oh, she was ugly! You wouldn't even sleep with her.
translation.fr:
Elle était moche !
Tu n'aurais même pas couché avec.

translation.en: Say, Don Don Diego...
where's your buy-in?
I thought it was 15 grand a man.
Let's see. Ah!
It's you!
What?
What "what"?
What are you so surprised about?
Just so surprised at all the... the fun that we're having here,
translation.fr:
Je suis surpris
qu'on s'amuse autant ici...

translation.en: with the card and the money and the booze and...
translation.fr: avec la carte, l'argent, l'alcool et...

translation.en: You know, I make that same face when I put my cologne on in the morning,
translation.fr:
Je fais cette tête quand je mets
mon eau de Cologne le matin,

translation.en: especially when I'm home alone.
translation.fr: surtout quand je suis seul chez moi.

translation.en: You know what I think?
translation.fr: Vous savez ce que je crois ?

translation.en: I think Don Don Diego isn't really a coffee bean rancher at all.
translation.fr:
Je crois que Don Don Diego
n'est pas planteur de tabac,

translation.en: And his true purpose here is to rob us.
translation.fr: mais qu'il est venu nous voler.

translation.en: Don't make me kill you, Mr. Earp. Hands up high.
translation.fr:
Ne m'obligez pas à vous tuer, M. Earp.
Les mains en l'air.

translation.en: Oh, snap! You got the drop on Wyatt Earp?
translation.fr:
La vache !
Vous avez neutralisé Wyatt Earp ?

translation.en: It's mi hermano. He's one bad hombre. [laughs]
translation.fr: C'est mi hermano. Un vrai méchant.

translation.en: [Tommy] No disrespect, fellas.
We're gonna have to tie you up, and we'll have to borrow your horses.
translation.fr:
on va devoir vous attacher
et emprunter vos chevaux.

translation.en: Ooh, what'd I miss?
[Ramon] Sweet Hog Rock, here we come!
translation.fr: Rocher de la Verge de Cochon, nous voici !

translation.en: [Ramon] Giddy up, Burro.
[Danny] Come on, Ramon!
[Chico] Right behind you, Tommy!
[Ramon] Hurry up, Burro! Move your ass!
[Tommy] Yeah, I think we found it.
translation.fr: Oui, je crois qu'on l'a trouvée.

translation.en: That is one sweet hog right there.
That is a sweet, majestic hog.
Yeah, that's a sweet one for sure.
translation.fr: Oui, elle est belle, c'est sûr.

translation.en: It's all right.
I'm confused. I don't see a hog or a pig anywhere.
translation.fr:
Je ne comprends pas.
Je ne vois pas de pin.

translation.en: [chuckling] All I see is the big old rock that looks like a weenie pee-pee.
translation.fr:
Tout ce que je vois, c'est un gros rocher
qui ressemble à une quéquette.

translation.en: -Oh, you guys call a pee-pee a "hog." -Yeah.
-That's weird. I like it, though. [laughs] -Yeah. Okay.
translation.fr:
- Bizarre. Mais ça me plaît.
- Oui. Bon.

translation.en: Problem is, I don't see no singing windmill anywhere.
translation.fr:
Le problème, c'est que je ne vois pas
d'éolienne chantante.

translation.en: -[distant humming] -Wait...
I hear it.
Yeah, it's coming from over there.
[Lil Pete] Ah! Daddy! Daddy!
Daddy! [gasps] Huh?
We're saved! We're saved!
Oh, it's just these assholes.
What the hell happened to you guys?
[spits] We was headed west to Frisco after we absconded with your loot.
translation.fr:
On partait vers San Francisco
après avoir piqué votre butin.

translation.en: But we ran into these real bad characters.
translation.fr: Mais on est tombés sur de gros méchants.

translation.en: It was Cicero something and his crazy-ass gang.
translation.fr:
C'était Ciceron quelque chose
et son gang de dingues.

translation.en: Cicero was here? Then he left?
[voice breaking] He left us in the dirt for fun.
translation.fr: Il nous a laissés comme ça pour se marrer.

translation.en: Who does that?
Sicko! [screams]
If this is where the singing windmill is, then why would they just up and leave?
translation.fr:
Si l'éolienne chantante est ici,
pourquoi sont-ils repartis ?

translation.en: Maybe that Stickie McSchnickens guy was just pulling our leg.
translation.fr:
Le type du Gourdin Frappe-Balle
nous a peut-être fait marcher.

translation.en: They went north... about two hours ago.
translation.fr:
Ils sont partis vers le nord,
il y a près de deux heures.

translation.en: Oh, yeah! Tommy can track 'em.
Let's saddle up. We're burning daylight.
translation.fr: En selle. On perd du temps.

translation.en: [Left-Eye Boys] Wait!
[Will Patch] You can't just leave us here, you gotta get us out!
translation.fr:
Ne nous laissez pas comme ça,
libérez-nous !

translation.en: -[snake rattling] -You don't need to-- Hey, hey, hey! We still got the money!
translation.fr:
Pas besoin de... Hé !
On a toujours l'argent !

translation.en: Yeah, I hid it in my pants. [stuttering] We'll give it back to ya!
translation.fr:
Je l'ai planqué dans mon pantalon.
On vous le rendra !

translation.en: We don't need no more. Let's go!
translation.fr: On n'en a plus besoin. On part !

translation.en: Hey! Can you at least help me pick these ants out of my beard before you head out?
translation.fr:
Vous pouvez enlever ces fourmis
de ma barbe avant de partir ?

translation.en: Please?
Tell you what, we'll dig you up on one condition.
translation.fr: Je vous déterre à une condition.

translation.en: -[all exclaiming] -You say it, we'll do it!
That you give up your lives of crime
and take this second chance to start doing good by people.
translation.fr:
et profitez de cette deuxième chance
pour bien agir.

translation.en: -I'd rather die! -Hell, no! I ain't doing that!
No way! Dumb Indian half!
translation.fr: Non ! Moitié d'Indien à la noix !

translation.en: That was a joke! That was a joke!
I'll be a good boy! I'll be a good boy, Daddy!
translation.fr: Je serai sage ! Je serai bien sage, papa !

translation.en: [Ramon] Now what? East or west?
Late in the day.
Lot of traffic been going through here.
translation.fr: Il y a beaucoup de passage ici.

translation.en: It's going to take a minute.
Well, we must be getting mighty close.
They'd better be treating Dad well, or they're gonna have to answer to us.
translation.fr:
Ils ont intérêt à bien traiter papa,
sinon ça va barder pour eux.

translation.en: There he is. -There's the man himself. -[Herm grunting]
-Look at that handsome hombre. -[Danny] Yeah.
-That's where we get our good looks. -[chuckling]
translation.fr:
C'est de là qu'on tient
notre beau physique.

translation.en: Let me see ol' Pop.
[Ramon] Does he still look like that, Tommy?
translation.fr: Il ressemble toujours à ça, Tommy ?

translation.en: Tommy?
Yeah, he does.
Let's set up camp tonight. Right out there.
translation.fr: On va camper ici, ce soir.

translation.en: But we can't waste any time.
translation.fr: On ne doit pas perdre de temps.

translation.en: Chico... I can't figure it out right now.
translation.fr: Chico, je n'arrive pas à voir.

translation.en: I gotta...
Just give me till sunrise. Let me think.
[Tommy] Dear brothers,
by the time you read this, I will have caught up with Dad.
translation.fr:
quand vous lirez ceci,
j'aurai rattrapé papa.

translation.en: And I'm sure you're sore at me for sneaking out on you.
translation.fr:
Et je suis sûr que vous m'en voudrez
d'être parti en douce.

translation.en: But this fellow, Cicero, who took Pa, also took my mother's life,
translation.fr:
Mais ce Ciceron qui a enlevé papa,
a aussi tué ma mère,

translation.en: and I mean to make him pay for that.
translation.fr: et je dois le lui faire payer.

translation.en: Things might get messy.
I can live with all the bad stuff we've done,
translation.fr:
Je peux supporter
toutes les bêtises qu'on a faites,

translation.en: the hold-ups, the burglaries, the accidental decapitation,
translation.fr:
les braquages, les vols,
la décapitation accidentelle,

translation.en: but I couldn't live with myself if something happened to one of you.
translation.fr:
mais je ne supporterais pas
qu'il vous arrive quoi que ce soit.

translation.en: So stay put and I'll be back with Dad as soon as I can.
translation.fr:
Restez tranquilles,
je vous ramène papa dès que je peux.

translation.en: And if I don't come back, know that I love you boys with all my heart.
translation.fr:
Si je ne reviens pas,
sachez que je vous aime de tout mon cœur.

translation.en: Your brother, Tommy.
[Tommy] Whoa.
[Frank] Down at Silver Canyon...
Meeting Betty Dunson... was the luckiest thing that ever happened to me.
translation.fr:
Rencontrer Betty Dunson est la plus
grande chance que j'aie jamais eue.

translation.en: Mom was his biggest score.
translation.fr: Son plus gros butin, c'était maman.

translation.en: [Cicero] Here we are.
We'd better not have come all this way for nothing.
translation.fr: Espérons qu'on n'est pas venus pour rien.

translation.en: -I want the money, Frank. -I know what you want.
translation.fr:
- Je veux l'argent, Frank.
- Je sais ce que tu veux.

translation.en: [Tommy] There's your money.
Count it.
Tommy!
Oh, look who showed up.
I didn't know if somebody dug up what you buried, Pa,
translation.fr:
J'ignore si quelqu'un a déterré
ce que tu as enterré, papa,

translation.en: so I wanted to make sure you were covered either way.
translation.fr:
donc je voulais m'assurer
que t'aies le magot.

translation.en: Thank you, son.
Well, ain't that a good boy.
That's my boy.
Well, it's been a pleasure, Frank.
translation.fr: Le plaisir est pour nous, Frank.

translation.en: But, uh... we'll be on our way.
Not so fast.
You and me got some unfinished business.
translation.fr: Toi et moi avons des choses à régler.

translation.en: No, our business is done.
Pa... you remember how I told you Ma died?
translation.fr:
Papa, tu te rappelles,
je t'ai dit comment maman était morte ?

translation.en: Well, the son of a bitch who shot her...
translation.fr: Eh bien, le salopard qui l'a tuée...

translation.en: had a tattoo on his hand...
translation.fr: avait un tatouage sur la main...

translation.en: just like Cicero here.
What, you mean...
my little horseshoe?
That's always brought me luck.
Especially when I was shooting somebody.
translation.fr: Surtout quand je tirais sur quelqu'un.

translation.en: Well, killer, your luck just ran out.
translation.fr: Eh bien, assassin, ta chance a tourné.

translation.en: Your hand touch that knife, boy,
translation.fr: Si tu touches à ce couteau, petit,

translation.en: it'll be the last thing you ever touch.
translation.fr: tu ne toucheras plus jamais à rien.

translation.en: Oh, I ain't using these knives.
Not for my mama.
I saved a special one just for you.
translation.fr:
Je t'ai réservé un couteau spécial
rien que pour toi.

translation.en: Now you die, Injun-lover.
He dies, you die.
Fourteen of us, six of you. Doesn't seem quite fair, does it?
translation.fr:
On est quatorze, vous êtes six.
Pas très équilibré, si ?

translation.en: Make that twelve of us.
[shouting] Twelve of us!
I ain't sign up for this shit.
translation.fr: J'ai pas signé pour ces conneries.

translation.en: You seeing this?
-It's not working. -What are you doing?
translation.fr:
- Ça ne marche pas.
- Que fais-tu ?

translation.en: Don't look like a tumbleweed at all, Herm.
translation.fr: Tu ne ressembles pas à de l'herbe séchée.

translation.en: Herm, come back! Come back, Herm.
All right, all right. Now, everybody just calm down.
translation.fr: Bon. Tout le monde se calme.

translation.en: A man's entitled... to kill his mother's killer.
translation.fr:
Un homme peut bien tuer
le tueur de sa mère.

translation.en: Plus... that's one less guy you've got to split the money with!
translation.fr:
En plus, ça fait un type en moins
avec qui partager l'argent !

translation.en: Good thinking, Frank. Let's ride!
[Gus Patch] Yeah! [Will Patch] Yeah, get on out of here!
Good job, son. I'm really proud of you.
translation.fr: Bravo, fiston. Je suis très fier de toi.

translation.en: And getting your friends to come all the way out here with you, brilliant.
translation.fr:
Et amener tes amis avec toi,
c'était une très bonne idée.

translation.en: Well, sir... they ain't just my friends, they, uh...
translation.fr: Ce ne sont pas juste mes amis...

translation.en: They're my brothers.
Five?
You had fun, didn't you, sir?
Well, I'm gonna introduce myself.
-I think they'd like that. -[clears throat]
Frank Stockburn, your dad.
-Nice to meet you. -Nice to meet you.
-Father. -Son.
This is my burro.
Proud to know you, Burro.
He's proud.
You must be, uh, Saint Louis, right?
translation.fr: Tu dois être Saint Louis, c'est ça ?

translation.en: Chico.
Boy, you got your mom's muscles.
translation.fr: Tu as les muscles de ta mère.

translation.en: You a prizefighter?
No, actually, I'm a... piano player.
Oh, well, I'll be!
You know, I've been known to tickle the ivories myself.
translation.fr: Moi aussi, je touche du clavier.

translation.en: Now and then, you know.
We should play together sometime. [chuckles]
translation.fr: On devrait jouer ensemble un jour.

translation.en: I'd like that, Dad.
[voice breaking] I'd like that a lot.
Yeah, son, we'll do that.
You must be Delilah's boy.
translation.fr: Tu dois être le fils de Dalila.

translation.en: Boy, she made some fine, fine whiskey.
translation.fr: Elle faisait un sacré bon whisky.

translation.en: She must've been really hitting it hard when she was pregnant with you.
translation.fr:
Elle a dû bien abuser
quand elle t'attendait.

translation.en: Atta boy, atta boy.
[grunts] Da-da.
And, uh... you are?
I'm Lil Pete. I'm your son! I love you so much, Dad!
translation.fr:
Je suis P'tit Pete. Ton fils !
Je t'aime tant, papa !

translation.en: -I have three nipples. -Yeah, well...
translation.fr:
- J'ai trois tétons.
- Ah oui, eh bien...

translation.en: It's always good to have a spare.
translation.fr: C'est bien d'en avoir un de rechange.

translation.en: -Gall dang, you have one, too? -Yeah.
translation.fr:
- Nom de dela, toi aussi ?
- Oui.

translation.en: Do you like to play with the extra one?
translation.fr: Tu aimes jouer avec celui en plus ?

translation.en: Oh, you betcha.
Oh, Pa, I have a question for you.
Where do babies come from?
Well, son, the mom just poops 'em out.
translation.fr: Eh bien, la mère les pond, c'est tout.

translation.en: [laughing] I knewed it! I knewed it, Dad!
Well, look at this handsome devil.
Sir, I'm Danny.
It's awful nice to finally meet ya.
translation.fr:
C'est très chouette
de te rencontrer enfin.

translation.en: Could you help me with a problem?
translation.fr: Tu peux m'aider avec mon problème ?

translation.en: I did a real stupid thing
translation.fr: J'ai fait quelque chose de très bête

translation.en: that inadvertently led to the death of a United States President,
translation.fr:
qui a mené par hasard à la mort
d'un Président des États-Unis,

translation.en: and I'm feeling pretty lousy about it.
Well, son... look in my eyes.
Shit happens.
Thanks. Thank you, sir.
-[Frank] You're welcome. -[exhales]
So, where to now, huh?
Well, sir, Smoking Fox and me are getting married in a few days,
translation.fr:
Splendeur Du Soir et moi nous marions
dans quelques jours,

translation.en: and Screaming Eagle's walking her down the aisle,
translation.fr: elle sera au bras d'Aigle Hurlant,

translation.en: and I was hoping...
you could be there, next to me.
Oh, you mean your best man?
translation.fr: Tu veux dire, être ton témoin ?

translation.en: Oh, Tommy...
You know, that's... that's quite an honor.
-It would be my honor, sir. -Yeah. Well, uh...
translation.fr:
- Pour moi, ce serait un honneur.
- Oui.

translation.en: But unfortunately, I...
I got some business up north that I gotta attend to.
translation.fr: j'ai des affaires à régler dans le nord.

translation.en: I gotta collect some gambling debts and...
translation.fr: Je dois récupérer des dettes de jeu et...

translation.en: You know, just to pay the doctors and such.
translation.fr: Tu sais, pour payer les médecins, tout ça.

translation.en: Say, Dad. You don't ever gotta worry about money ever again.
translation.fr:
Papa. Tu n'as plus jamais
à te soucier d'argent.

translation.en: We had to conjure up 50 grand twice!
translation.fr: On a dû rassembler 50 000 deux fois !

translation.en: So we ended up with 100!
-A hundred? -[Tommy] Yes, sir.
There's another 50 grand?
Right here, in the burro's saddlebag.
translation.fr: Là, dans la selle de l'âne.

translation.en: So that business can wait up north, can't it... best man?
translation.fr:
Donc tes affaires dans le nord
peuvent bien attendre, non ?

translation.en: Well, now that you mention it, maybe I should change my plans.
translation.fr:
Maintenant que tu le dis,
je devrais changer de programme.

translation.en: -Bueno. Bueno. [laughs] -[Frank] Yeah. [whistles]
Hey! What are they doing back?
What is this?
I guess it's time you kids
translation.fr: Il est temps pour vous, les enfants,

translation.en: learned the truth about your dear old dad, huh?
translation.fr:
d'apprendre la vérité
sur votre cher vieux père.

translation.en: I'm just too famous.
I can't walk into any town west of the Rockies
translation.fr:
Je ne peux aller nulle part
à l'ouest des Rocheuses

translation.en: without someone calling the law.
translation.fr: sans qu'on fasse appel à la loi.

translation.en: So, I came up with a way we could make 50 grand
without lifting a finger. [chuckles]
And you rascals brought us double!
translation.fr:
Et vous autres, garnements,
m'en avez apporté le double !

translation.en: Are these my kids or what?
translation.fr: Ce sont bien mes gamins, non ?

translation.en: Son of a bitch!
If our two gangs joined forces,
translation.fr: Si nos deux gangs unissaient leurs forces,

translation.en: there's not a lawman in the West that would stand up against us.
translation.fr:
aucun shérif de l'Ouest
ne nous résisterait.

translation.en: What makes you think we'd turn to a life of crime?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi crois-tu
qu'on deviendrait des criminels ?

translation.en: 'Cause it's in your blood.
translation.fr: Parce que c'est dans votre sang.

translation.en: Answer me something.
Were you ever great at anything in your life besides stealing?
translation.fr:
Avez-vous jamais rien réussi,
à part voler ?

translation.en: You apples didn't fall far from this tree.
Don't deny who you are.
translation.fr: Ne niez pas votre véritable nature.

translation.en: If you knew who we really were,
translation.fr: Si tu connaissais notre véritable nature,

translation.en: you'd be very scared right now.
Don't overplay your hand, son.
translation.fr: Ne profite pas trop de ton avantage.

translation.en: I'm still holding an ace.
translation.fr: Il me reste un as en main.

translation.en: I found her. I-- I told you I'd find her.
translation.fr:
Je l'ai trouvée.
Je vous avais dit que je la trouverai.

translation.en: This little beauty stumbled into our camp a few days ago.
translation.fr:
La petite beauté est tombée
sur notre campement il y a quelques jours.

translation.en: She actually tried to rescue me.
translation.fr: Elle a tenté de me sauver.

translation.en: I'm guessing this means you don't want me to be your best man no more, huh?
translation.fr:
J'imagine que tu ne veux plus de moi
comme témoin ?

translation.en: Well, I'm gonna make this real simple for you.
translation.fr: Je vais te simplifier les choses.

translation.en: Hand over the other 50 grand... in that stupid ass' saddlebag,
translation.fr:
Donne-moi les autres 50 000
de la selle de cette bourrique

translation.en: or I put a bullet in her pretty Apache head.
translation.fr:
ou je colle une balle
dans son joli minois d'Apache.

translation.en: That ain't gonna happen.
Oh, it ain't?
Why's that?
Mmm... kind of a secret.
Well, you can tell your old man, can't ya?
translation.fr: Tu peux bien le dire à ton vieux, non ?

translation.en: You know that bag... -your boy's holding? -Uh-huh.
translation.fr: Tu sais le sac que tient ton ami ?

translation.en: It was meant for Cicero.
So there's something special in there.
-Plan B. -Plan B?
[garbled] Plan B.
Give me that bag.
Oh, shit!
[Tommy whispering] Where is she?
Smoking Fox.
Nighty-night, son.
-Danny, are you all right? -[groaning]
You done good, Daniel. You saved me.
translation.fr: Bravo, Daniel. Tu m'as sauvé la vie.

translation.en: It's my duty, Mr. President.
translation.fr: C'est mon devoir, M. le Président.

translation.en: Mrs. Lincoln.
Come on! Come on! Come here.
[Frank] Get in.
I got one!
Clem, you almost shot me!
translation.fr: Clem, tu as failli me toucher !

translation.en: [man] Come on, get the horses!
My ass! My ass!
Is this here still valid, or is it too burnt up?
translation.fr:
C'est toujours valide
ou c'est trop cramé ?

translation.en: Let me take a look here.
Uh, that looks good to me. I mean, this looks good.
translation.fr: Ça me semble bon. Il a l'air correct.

translation.en: What in the hell?
You didn't scoop yours out, did you?
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas enlevé le tien ?

translation.en: What was the question again?
What?
Did any of you really do it?
Well, then whose eyes are in that jar?
translation.fr: Et les yeux dans le bocal ?

translation.en: Well, Babyface found some rocks, and, uh, painted them.
translation.fr:
Babyface a trouvé des pierres
et les a peintes.

translation.en: Surprise?
[echoing] Hey, Tom, you wanna play a game
translation.fr: Tom, tu veux jouer à un jeu

translation.en: to make up for all the father-son time we missed?
translation.fr:
pour rattraper tout le temps perdu
entre père et fils ?

translation.en: Peek-a-boo.
[Frank] Hey, come over here!
No, come over there!
You could have had everything, son.
translation.fr: Tu aurais pu tout avoir, fiston.

translation.en: But you had to do the right thing.
translation.fr: Mais il a fallu que tu agisses bien.

translation.en: Let me leave you with a bit of fatherly advice.
translation.fr: Je vais te donner un conseil de père.

translation.en: -Never bring a knife to a gunfight. -[gun cocking]
translation.fr:
N'apporte jamais un couteau
dans un combat à l'arme à feu.

translation.en: [Tommy] One day, there will be too many, my love.
translation.fr: Un jour, il y en aura trop.

translation.en: [Smoking Fox] But not today.
That was some mystical shit.
Tommy.
You knew Cicero killed my mother.
translation.fr: Tu savais que Ciceron avait tué ma mère.

translation.en: No, I didn't know that.
No more lies!
Yeah, I knew. I knew.
Your mother insisted on telling.
She was going to rat the whole gang out, and I tried to convince her--
translation.fr:
Elle allait balancer tout le gang,
j'ai tenté de la convaincre...

translation.en: Tommy, look, I'm your father, for God's sake.
translation.fr:
Tommy, je suis ton père,
pour l'amour du ciel.

translation.en: You don't kill your father, Tommy.
translation.fr: On ne tue pas son père, Tommy.

translation.en: His name is White Knife.
I ain't gonna kill you.
translation.fr: Je ne vais pas te tuer.

translation.en: 'Cause my true father taught me otherwise.
translation.fr:
Mon véritable père m'a donné
d'autres principes.

translation.en: You can't leave me like this!
translation.fr: Ne me laisse pas comme ça !

translation.en: Tommy!
You can't leave me here alone!
translation.fr: Ne me laisse pas seul ici !

translation.en: [Lil Pete] Dear Mama, so much has changed since my last letter.
translation.fr:
Chère maman, bien des choses ont changé
depuis ma dernière lettre.

translation.en: I scarcely know where to begin.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas par où commencer.

translation.en: First off, it turns out our daddy is a bad, bad man,
translation.fr: D'abord, notre père est un vrai méchant,

translation.en: and he got thrown in jail.
translation.fr: et il a fini en prison.

translation.en: But it's okay, 'cause Screaming Eagle, the Indian chief who raised Tommy,
translation.fr:
Mais ce n'est pas grave, Aigle Hurlant,
le chef indien qui a élevé Tommy

translation.en: said he'd be all our dads, too.
translation.fr: a dit qu'il serait notre père à tous.

translation.en: I really like it here in this village.
translation.fr: Je me plais beaucoup dans ce village.

translation.en: Our new brothers and sisters love to have fun
translation.fr:
Nos nouveaux frères et sœurs
adorent s'amuser

translation.en: and have been so nice to all of us.
translation.fr: et sont si gentils avec nous.

translation.en: These white guys cannot dance.
translation.fr: Les Blancs ne savent pas danser.

translation.en: [Lil Pete] Danny don't drink whiskey no more.
translation.fr: Danny ne boit plus de whisky.

translation.en: [Lil Pete] And Ramon and Herm are trying to learn Indian ways.
translation.fr:
Et Ramon et Herm essaient d'apprendre
les coutumes indiennes.

translation.en: [Lil Pete] Oh, and big news...
I finally have a girlfriend,
and she's much prettier than a canty-loupe.
translation.fr: Elle est bien plus jolie qu'un melon.

translation.en: Come on, you two! You're missing all the fun.
translation.fr: Allez, vous deux ! Vous ratez la fête !

translation.en: Anyways, Mama, thanks for raising me.
translation.fr: Bref, maman, merci de m'avoir élevé.

translation.en: Your loving son, Lil Pete,
translation.fr: Ton fils qui t'aime, P'tit Pete,

translation.en: proud member of the Ridiculous 6.
translation.fr: fier de faire partie Les 6 Ridiculos.

translation.en: [Abner] Before you go...
Two, four, six, eight.
Who do we appreciate?
The Stockburns! The Stockburns!
Yeah! The Stockburns!
